item.title: Stay Forever: The Life and Music of Dusty Springfield
item.description: Originally shown at the L.A. Gay & Lesbian Centerâ€™s Lily Tomlin/Jane Wagner Cultural Arts Center, Jorja Fox produced this with Bunnyhop Productions in 2008. In 2012, the show was revived off-Broadway.
